name: verify-api
description: Smoke test both services by running sample API requests and verifying responses

prompts.name: main
prompts.description: Verify both services are running and responding correctly
prompts.content:
Execute the following verification tasks:

1. Check if services are running:
   - Verify Mutant Service on port 8080
   - Verify Stats Service on port 8081
   - If either is not running, inform the user to start them

2. Test Mutant Service (POST /mutant/):
   - Send mutant DNA (should return 200):
     ```json
     {"dna":["ATGCGA","CAGTGC","TTATGT","AGAAGG","CCCCTA","TCACTG"]}
     ```
   - Send human DNA (should return 403):
     ```json
     {"dna":["ATGCGA","CAGTGC","TTATTT","AGACGG","GCGTCA","TCACTG"]}
     ```
   - Send invalid DNA (should return 400):
     ```json
     {"dna":["ATGCGA","CAGTGC","TTATTT"]}
     ```

3. Test Stats Service (GET /stats/):
   - Retrieve statistics
   - Verify response contains: count_mutant_dna, count_human_dna, ratio
   - Verify ratio calculation is correct (count_mutant_dna / count_human_dna)

4. Report results:
   ```
   Endpoint                    | Expected | Actual | Status
   ----------------------------|----------|--------|--------
   POST /mutant/ (mutant)      | 200      | XXX    | ✓/✗
   POST /mutant/ (human)       | 403      | XXX    | ✓/✗
   POST /mutant/ (invalid)     | 400      | XXX    | ✓/✗
   GET /stats/                 | 200      | XXX    | ✓/✗
   GET /stats/ (valid format)  | ✓        | ✓/✗    | ✓/✗
   ```

If any test fails, provide details about the unexpected response.
